channel.title: CVE Feed for Optigo Networks -- ONS-S8 Spectra Aggregation Switch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Optigo Networks -- ONS-S8 Spectra Aggregation Switch

item.title: CVE-2024-45367|2024-10-03T22:19:35.215Z -- optigo%20networks -- ons-s8%20spectra%20aggregation%20switch
item.description: The web server for ONS-S8 - Spectra Aggregation Switch includes an incomplete authentication process, which can lead to an attacker authenticating without a password.

item.title: CVE-2024-41925|2024-10-03T22:17:31.725Z -- optigo%20networks -- ons-s8%20spectra%20aggregation%20switch
item.description: The web service for ONS-S8 - Spectra Aggregation Switch includes functions which do not properly validate user input, allowing an attacker to traverse directories, bypass authentication, and execute remote code.
